DataElement.preferredName: Hormonal Contraception Current Or Prior Greater Than One Year Use Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes or no response to indicate whether hormonal contraceptives are currently being used or previously used for more than one year.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Hormonal Contraception Current Or Prior Greater Than One Year Use
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The birth control method that utilizes external source of sex hormones to prevent pregnancy by interfering with the ovulation, fertilization or implantation of the fertilized egg in the uterus._Occurring in or belonging to the present time._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._Earlier in time or order._A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status._The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object._A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period._A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The birth control method that utilizes external source of sex hormones to prevent pregnancy by interfering with the ovulation, fertilization or implantation of the fertilized egg in the uterus.

Concepts.definition: The birth control method that utilizes external source of sex hormones to prevent pregnancy by interfering with the ovulation, fertilization or implantation of the fertilized egg in the uterus.

Property.preferredName: Current Or Prior Greater Than One Year Use
Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:Earlier in time or order.:A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status.:The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.:A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.:A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

Concepts.definition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: A category of organic or inorganic substances, elements, and isotopes used in research or for the prevention, diagnosis, and/or treatment of disease states. Includes biologically active substances that are either synthetically manufactured or endogenous substances extracted and processed to be reintroduced into an organism. Chemicals and drugs also include hazardous substances, and naturally occurring or synthetically produced substances required to maintain life.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ReferenceDocuments.description: Current use or former use >1 year of hormonal contraceptives
